publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3598 Willie Coffey: East Ayrshire Sports Council Awards—That the Parliament congratulates the winners of the East Ayrshire Sports Council Awards for 2009; notes the high standard of winners, including Scott Connelly who won Disabled Sportsperson of the Year and has been involved for over 14 years with the Sports for Special Needs club, which was awarded Sports Club of the Year, Lyndsay McCreath of the Aquarius Gymnastics Club who won the Jim Higgins Youth Sports Personality of the Year award and Peter Kirkbride of Kilmarnock Amateur Weightlifting Club who won the Individual Performance of the Year award; recognises in particular the contribution of Eddie Cassidy, recipient of the award for Service to Sport after 52 years’ involvement with the Cluaran Kwai Judo Club, and commends all winners and nominees for their determination, dedication and commitment to fair play.
